results.content: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.
results.author: Indira Gandhi

results.content: Where there is love there is life.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as being able to remake ourselves.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: We must become the change we want to see.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the worlds problems.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: It is the quality of our work which will please God, not the quantity.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi
